title: F/S - 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamp - Bob Groom - SOLD

posts.post_title: F/S - 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamp - Bob Groom - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Will listen to offers on this 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamp of Bob Groom with general creasing and staining as shown.  Reverse is complete.  Slight tear in right border but does not go through the border.  Shipping only to US addresses.  Payment by Check, Money Order or PayPal F/F.  PM or email questions / offers to [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].  Thanks!  Kevin
